tasks.label: Build SFML Project
args: if [[ $OSTYPE == 'darwin'* ]]; then g++ -std=c++17 -g ${file} src/glad_4.1.c -o ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension} -I${workspaceFolder}/include -I${workspaceFolder}/include/glad_mac -I${workspaceFolder}/include/KHR -L/usr/local/lib -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -ldl -x c; else g++ -std=c++17 -g ${file} src/glad_4.6.c -o ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension} -I${workspaceFolder}/include -I${workspaceFolder}/include/glad_windows -I${workspaceFolder}/include/KHR -L/usr/local/lib -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -ldl -x c; fi
